primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God breaks through the human world via His messengers (Angels/Christ) to manifest His presence, judgment, and ultimate mercy, overriding human categories and fears.

subject.identificatie: God / The Angel of the Lord (Christ)
tekstueel_bewijs: Angels appear at the pure will of God and for no other cause.
The divine world has broken through into this one.

object.identificatie: The manifestation of Divine Presence and the salvation/protection of the people.
tekstueel_bewijs: They exist only to direct our attention to God.
The angel of his presence saved them.
Angels appear at the pure will of God.

ontvanger.identificatie: Humanity / The Hearer (specifically those in 'fiery furnaces')
tekstueel_bewijs: The Lord protects his children from his judgment with his own compassion.
God’s angel comes to feed and restore him.
An angel appears to shut the mouths of the beasts.

tegenstander.identificatie: Sin, Death, The Dragon (Satan), and Human Presumption (New Age angel worship)
tekstueel_bewijs: Michael and his angels fighting against the dragon.
The angel of death is no match for the resurrection.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not merely bad habits but 'The Dragon' and 'Death' itself, requiring a divine Subject.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The ethical response of the believer to God's presence, specifically regarding social justice.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer / The Church
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Compassion for the defenseless (soup kitchens, social services)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The ethical mandate is presented as the proper fruit of correctly perceiving God's presence, rather than a means to achieve it.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God has a case against us.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We ask, 'Are angels male or female?'
Christian people need to be a lot less focused on angel sightings.

voorbeelden: Christian people need to be a lot less focused on angel sightings.
If people want to get in touch with their angels...
In order to understand what angels are, we need to understand what they are not.
Satan is no match for the commander.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon emphasizes the 'Ability' (Power) of God over the 'Obligation' (Duty) of man. The focus is on what God has done and can do in the face of human inability.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from ~S1 (Triviality) to S2 (Real Dread/Judgment) and finally to S1 (Grace in Christ).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by Christ being the 'Yes' that encases the 'No' of judgment.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Very high; Rilke's 'Every angel is terrible' is used to establish the necessity of grace.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon consistently places God/Christ as the active Subject of salvation and victory, while the human hearer is the receiver of a 'Yes' that they cannot produce themselves.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Ethical imperative linked to social services
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: they’d be a lot better off working at a soup kitchen.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: Subject-switch to Christ in the 'fiery furnace'
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: identified as a pre-incarnation appearance of the Lord Jesus himself.
all the promises of God find their Yes in him.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Joshua and Gideon are not presented as heroes to imitate, but as people confronted by a God who is 'not for them' in a tribal sense but for His own sovereign purpose.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: Joshua is the recipient of a divine 'No' that humbles human agendas.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and awe; moving from self-help (Subject) to being helped (Receiver).
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic grace: God acts, man receives.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the 'terrible' angel of judgment to the 'Yes' of Christ is logically and narratively seamless.
spanning_punten: The brief shift to political critique of Social Service cuts slightly disrupts the cosmic narrative flow.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Satan is no match for the commander... The angel of death is no match for the resurrection.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon focuses more on the objective work of Christ than the subjective work of the Spirit.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: High; God has a 'case against us' that causes dread.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: Strongly theocentric structure with God as the primary Subject. The narrative engine is driven by Divine Breakthrough rather than human effort.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: The hearer might identify with the 'New Age' consumer as an opponent.
identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: The hearer as the one in the 'fiery furnace'.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Deepen the connection between the hearer's current suffering and the 'fourth man' in the fire.

modale_balans.huidige_onbalans: Strong emphasis on Savoir (knowing what angels are) and Pouvoir (God's power).
modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain current balance; it serves the grace-orientation well.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God's Yes) clearly grounds the Ethics (Soup kitchens).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This is a masterclass in avoiding moralistic exemplarism. By making the Angel/Christ the Subject, the preacher offers true comfort rather than a new 'to-do' list.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis would focus on the use of the Time magazine hook, semiotics reveals that the hook serves to deconstruct the human-as-subject (self-help) and replace it with God-as-subject.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Joshua text; semiotics shows how the 'No' of the angel functions as a narrative pivot to destroy human tribalism.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas's model exposes that the 'New Age' angels are actually 'Helpers' in a human-centric story, whereas Biblical angels are 'Subjects' or 'Senders' in a God-centric story.

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully uses the 'Heavy Opponent' (Death/Satan) to necessitate a 'Subject-switch' to Christ.
